ComicInfo.Summary:
Tyne Tunnel: Savage is nearly captured when a "dirty Volg agent" masquerades as recently murdered Geordie Price.
Harlem Heroes Part 23: With the Bushido Blades sacrificing players like kamikaze pilots of old, Harlem's Louis Mayer has developed strange mental powers.
Shako [Part 3]: After the knockout dart wears off, Shako is a might bit peeved. Falmuth's arm, his killing arm!, becomes Shako's trophy.
Hollow World Part 12: The Mekon and the Two of Verath fall into a stalemate: both will die if the other perishes. Dare and Rok escape the starquake.
Spy Plane: Probe must retrieve a vital film from downed pilot John Peel, but the Russians are just as interested in the goods as he!
Smoker's Crime: Mega-City 1 has strict anti-smoking laws; one lawbreaker learns that smoke from the city's Smokatorium is more effective than tear gas.
